channel.title: Please help! need an expert!
channel.description: need an expert (or maybe this is just stupid) but hey im new to mopar and i have 1 big problem, i have an account called zezima and anytime i try to log in now to 127.0.0.1, 0.0.0.0, local, or whatever it logs me in, i can't do anything, and it loses connection and i cant log in again. i tried making other accounts too and the same thing happens everytime, i can only play for a certain time. please help, thanks!

item.title: Please help! need an expert!
item.dc:creator: @trees_rule50 trees rule50
item.description:
@trees_rule50 wrote:

project fallout, u seem like an expert but… what the heck r u talking about? whats a hyperion with a deob? if that’ll fix it then great! im using moparscape 3.2 and when i try and log into my acc by pressing start server, it gives me this for a server IP: 127.0.0.1 and I would try any random acc name and pass and it’ll work fine for like 5 or 10 minutes then i lose connection and anytime I try to log back in to that same acc it will log in and lose connection after like 10 seconds.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help! need an expert!
item.dc:creator: @ta1nt3d ta1nt3d
item.description:
@ta1nt3d wrote:

what error does you client give? is it T1- or T2-?

Read full topic

Baddy, I’m not an idiot… Whatever server he’s using is terrible, he might as well learn correctly using a fresh Hyperion.

item.title: Please help! need an expert!
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

… what i told him should work unless its just his source. You have no idea what u are talking about, what i said is true in almost all servers, i can show an example if u want…

Read full topic

item.title: Please help! need an expert!
item.dc:creator: @project_fallout project fallout
item.description:
@project_fallout wrote:

Lol?

Use Hyperion with a deob.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help! need an expert!
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

actually it jsut means there is an error in the client (or it is not the client to use for the source) It could also be that the server does not allow other clients in which case do to server.ini or server.txt (one of those) and remove the line ClientRequired = ####

Read full topic

item.title: Please help! need an expert!
item.dc:creator: @Mr.czar Mr.czar
item.description:
@Mr.czar wrote:

I wish i could help it is possible to make it work but the easiest way is to just get another client.

Read full topic

the client doesn’t support the source. delta, czar, bluurs, etc.
